title: Kicking Horse - Palliser to Kicking Horse Rest Area
section_name: Palliser to Kicking Horse Rest Area
whats_it_like: 12 km of high quality river running
scouting_portaging: All rapids are boat-scoutable except "portage/shotgun" which has a sign to alert paddlers of where to scout from.

time.original: 1-2 hours on the water (15 min. at flood stage)
